titleStmt.title: The two Lancashire lovers: or the excellent history of Philocles and Doriclea Expressing the faithfull constancy and mutuall fidelity of two loyall lovers. Stored with no lesse variety of discourse to delight the generous, then of serious advice to instruct the amorous. By Musæus Palatinus.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin. For R. B[est] or his assignes,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, with imprint containing "Printed by E.G. for R. Best". Variant: engraved title page imprint contains "Printed by E.G. for R.B. or his assignes".
Running title reads: The history of Philocles and Doriclea.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: Edward Griffin. For R. B[est] or his
